title: Specialized “Grit & Grace” designs custom women’s road bikes for Paris-Roubaix Femme
content:
After 117 races, you could say it’s about time we see a women’s field in the queen of the classics, the legendary cobbled Paris-Roubaix. To celebrate, Specialized tapped senior designer Kayla Clarot to design the bikes for their pro women riders in the 118th edition of the race. Here’s the story… From Specialized: It may

The post Specialized “Grit & Grace” designs custom women’s road bikes for Paris-Roubaix Femme appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
